name: eleven
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 the number 11: There are eleven girls in my class and ten boys. My younger brother is eleven.
More examplesFewer examplesSophie took her first steps when she was eleven months old.I was so exhausted I slept for eleven solid hours.She got her very own pony as a birthday present when she was eleven.Two 11s are 22.Think of a number between eleven and 20.

a team of eleven players, for example in football, hockey, or cricket: starting eleven He comes back into the starting eleven after an injury.first eleven She's a regular in the first eleven.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was senior athletics champion, and played in the cricket eleven. Many young players still find themselves in county second elevens. They were not in the eleven at the start of the season, but came through because of injuries.
